data.text: @squarm Hi @squarm , since it is a public platform we are not able to request some details pertaining to your issue. Hence, we appreciate if you could DM us with the flight details, passenger name and registered email address, so we can check and advise you further. Thank you -Feri
Future pilot right there! 👀 ✈️ https://t.co/VftYnP6C7D
@jjyubabyjae Hi Tien! Kindly send us a DM with the relevant details for us to look further into your concern. Your understanding is much appreciated and we apologise for the inconvenience caused. -cw
@abangazlan1980 Kami memahami kebimbangan anda dan memohon maaf atas kesulitan yang berlaku. Sila hantarkan DM kami untuk bantuan lanjut. Terima kasih. -cw

@middleofthelane สวัสดีค่ะ คุณ middleofthelane
ทางสายการบินฯ ต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกอย่างสูงสำหรับเหตุการณ์ที่เกิดขึ้นนะคะ อย่างไรก็ตามเจ้าหน้าที่รบกวนท่านดำเนินการส่งรายละเอียดดังกล่าวอีกครั้งผ่านทาง DM เพื่อที่เจ้าหน้าที่จะดำเนินการตรวจสอบ และช่วยเหลือท่านในขั้นตอนต่อไป ขอบคุณค่ะ
@skasrina Hi @skasrina, We understand your concern. Our respective team will respond to your inquiry via email. Thank you. -Noel-

@nvrmnd28 Hi @nvrmnd28,  Our sincerest apologies for the delay and inconvenience. Kindly DM us your case number and email so we can send you updates as soon as possible once your refund request has been completed. Thank you very much for your patience. -KL

@AninaChandy Hi @AninaChandy , as per checked PNR WYKFKH the booking was confirmed and we had resend the itinerary to your booking initial email address for your perusal.   Hence , kindly check your mailbox/spam/ junk .Thanks! Ara

@bobtheturtlee Hi @bobtheturtlee ,Thank you for your lovely feedback about one of our staff "Nazli Atta" . We highly appreciate you taking your time to submit the compliment. Have a lovely day ahead. Thanks!Are

@PrateekB88 Hi @PrateekB88 , with regards to your concern for concern for PNR IYTJ5B  as per checked the refund status "pending bank process .The rest assured that you will be notified via email once the  refund has been completed and sent to your account .Thanks! Ara

data.text: @friskarslt Hai @friskarslt, Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang dirasakan. Kami berusaha sebaik mungkin agar penerbangan dapat diterbangkan sesuai jadwal. Namun, beberapa faktor menyebabkan penjadwalan ulang penerbangan.  Silakan DM kami untuk bantuan lebih lanjut. Terima kasih -Noel-
@DeppDuck Hi  @DeppDuck,our sincere apologies for the unpleasant experience with us . Thus , we appreciate it if you provide us the PNR / booking number by DM us.Thanks! Ara
@MaxBoon1 Hi @MaxBoon1, we have response your concern via case 110069264 and we have escalated to the respective team for the process. Thank you. -Noel-
@isaac_lo Hi @isaac_lo, We are sorry you feel that way. Please DM us to discuss further on your concern. Thank you for your kind understanding. -KL
@iamterry1991 Hi Terry, may we have the related case number to check it for you? Thank you. -cw
@LynaMeline Hi  @LynaMeline ,our sincere apologies for the unpleasant experience with us . You may try to purchase AirAsia Super+  at this link  https://t.co/0vOnD2kpYD .Thanks! Ara

urls.title: Travel Requirements - Thailand
urls.description: *Important Reminder: This page serves as your guidance only. AirAsia adheres to the highest standards of safety at all times. The list of travel requirements info stated here are a compilation of summarised regulations in the countries/destinations where our flights are operating. As the travel requirements worldwide continue to change from time to time, there are times when the information stated below might not be up-to-date and may be obsolete at the time you are viewing it. Therefore, for more

data.text: @vikasranjan148 Hi Vikas! Sorry to inform that the Credit Account payment option is currently not applicable for I5 carrier flight. Thank you for your kind understanding. -cw
@AnnieCh68200739 We have replied to your DM, do check it out. Thank you. -cw
@chenyee123 Hi @chenyee123 , Good day. Appreciated if you could DM (Direct Message) us with your booking details for further checking. Thank you -Feri

@ForW211 Hi @ForW211 , we apologize for the delayed process. Since it is a public platform, we appreciate if you could DM us with the booking details and case number so we can check and advise you further. Thank you -Feri
@wih_wih_wi Sorry to keep you waiting, kindly refer to your inbox for further information and assistance. Thank you. -cw
@wih_wih_wi Sorry to keep you waiting, kindly refer to your inbox for further information and assistance. Thank you. -cw

@flouristy Hi @flouristy mohon maaf atas keterlambatan dalam membalas permasalahan kamu. Apabila hal ini terkait dengan AirAsia Food atau Travelmall kamu dapat terhubung dengan layanan bantuan kami di tautan https://t.co/H49pIqD56y > Food / Travelmall, dan ikuti petunjuk selanjutnya. Tks

domain.name: Brand

urls.title: Home | Customer Support
urls.description: Have a question about your AirAsia flight? Let us help you. Booking · Baggage · Refund · Check-in · Special Guests · Products And Services · Payment And Fees · Inflight.

data.text: @bartlandia We do appreciate your patience and kind understanding while our team is looking into expediting your request. Thank you. -cw
@bartlandia We do appreciate your patience and kind understanding while our team is looking into expediting your request. Thank you. -cw
